title: Americans Would Send US Forces in Taiwan Strait Crisis: Poll
description: The share of respondents supporting direct military intervention has risen by 12 percentage points compared with a year ago.
content:
The share of respondents supporting direct military intervention has risen by 12 percentage points compared with a year ago.
This story appeared on newsweek.com, 2025-12-04 08:33:37.
